name: stock_v2_key_stats_get_operating_efficiency
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ms_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etc... to create a site/application such as morningstar.com
API description: Fetch operating efficiency key stats from the provided performance ID using the Morningstar API.

performanceid.description: The value of the performanceId field obtained from the /auto-complete, /get-summary, or /get-movers endpoints.
